name: Sky Track Bus Sim: MegaRamps V
name_original: Sky Track Bus Sim: MegaRamps V
description:
Sky Track Bus Sim: MegaRamps V2 is going crazy over the impossible sky tracks mega bus games. Undoubtedly, this new trend of vertical mega ramp racing is surely a worthy addition to the racing and simulation games category. The drifts and skids that mark your spirit of going beyond speed limits on the risky impossible tracks accelerates the thrill of this fast and super furious grand mega bus racing mania that is full of amazing bus drifts.
FEATURES
Toughest megaramp vertical runners
Rival rebel racing assaults
Challenging impossible difficult sky high tracks
Heavy mountain bus with improved racing physics
Fullfree GT auto crazy mid-air jumpers to support grand jumps
Offroad bus driving environment
